pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Collection from the Central Bank of Brazil // Provides tools to facilitate the access and processing of data from the Central Bank of Brazil API. The package allows users to retrieve economic and financial data, transforming them into usable tabular formats for further analysis. The data is obtained from the Central Bank of Brazil API: https://api.bcb.g ov.br/dados/serie/bcdata.sgs.{series_code}/dados?formato=jsonda taInicial={start_date}dataFinal={end_date}.
